channel.title: Accomplishment on TJNU-iOS-Club
channel.description: Recent content in Accomplishment on TJNU-iOS-Club

item.title: [Project] VideoNote-University video note-taking tool based on iPadOS and deep learning
item.description: 2020 Tianjin School level National Undergraduate Training Programs for Innovation and Entrepreneurship.

item.title: [Award] National third award on 2019 China Collegiate Computing Contest (Top 2.5%)
item.description: This contest is held by Tsinghua University, Nankai University and Bytes Bounce Company, Inc to all students over the great China area.

item.title: [Project] Hierachical Attention for Speech Emotion Recognition
item.description: Using hierarchical attention mechanisms at the level of sentences and words to improve the accuracy of speech emotion recognition. This project is supported by National Natural Science Foundation.

item.title: [Scholarship] Wang Kechang Culture and Technology Innovation Scholarship (<1%)
item.description: Annual Wang Kechang Culture and Technology Innovation Scholarship.

item.title: [Publication] Deep Spectrum Feature Representations for Speech Emotion Recognition
item.description: Oral paper on ACM Multimedia 2018 ASMMC-MMAC workshop.

item.title: [Award] National third award on 2018 China Collegiate Computing Contest (Top 10%)
item.description: China University Student Service Outsourcing Innovation and Entrepreneurship Competition is a national competition jointly organized by the Ministry of Commerce of China, the Ministry of Education of China and the Wuxi People’s Government

item.title: [Project] Campus intelligent auditing system based on Deep Learning and WeChat Applet
item.description: 2018 Tianjin School level National Undergraduate Training Programs for Innovation and Entrepreneurship.

item.title: [Publication] Exploring Spatio-Temporal Representations by Integrating Attention-based Bidirectional-LSTM-RNNs and FCNs for Speech Emotion Recognition
[Award] National third award on 2017 China Collegiate Computing Contest (Top 6%)
item.description: This contest is held by Zhejiang University and Apple, Inc to all students over the great China area.

item.title: [Project] Depression Detection Software Based on Speech and Tune
item.description: 2017 Tianjin Province level National Undergraduate Training Programs for Innovation and Entrepreneurship.

item.title: [Award] National third award on 2016 China Collegiate Computing Contest (Top 10%)
item.description: This contest is held by Zhejiang University and Apple, Inc to all students over the great China area.

title = “[Award] The Second Prize in National Computer Design Contest Tianjin Division” summary = " The China University Computer Design Contest (hereinafter referred to as the “Contest”) is organized by the Ministry of Education’s Higher School Computer Professional Teaching Guidance Committee, the Ministry of Education’s Higher School Software Engineering Teaching Guidance Committee, the Ministry of Education’s Higher School Computer Course Teaching Guidance Committee, and the Ministry of Education The school’s liberal arts computer basic teaching guidance subcommittee and China Education Television jointly sponsored.
